fr.istic.synthlab.abstraction.observer

Interface Observable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICInputPort, ICOutputPort, ICPort, IInputPort, IOutputPort, IPort
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CInputPort, COutputPort, InputPort, OutputPort, Port

    public interface Observable

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserver(Observer<? extends Observable> o)
      Adds an observer to be called when this observable object will call notifyObservers()
      void notifyObservers()
      Calls update(T) on every registered observer
      void removeObserver(Observer<? extends Observable> o)
      Removes the given observer from this observable object observers list
